content: **knitted balaclava in drops alpaca bouclé and drops kid-silk the piece is worked in stocking stitch with i-cord sizes s - xl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #snowwhitehood drops design pattern ab-176 yarn group c + a or d ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s/m - l/xl fits head-size 54/56 - 58/60 cm **yarn** drops alpaca bouclé from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 150-150 g colour 0100 off white and use drops kid-silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50-50 g colour 01 off white **needles** drops circular needle size 5 5 mm length 80 cm drops double pointed needles size 5 5 mm **knitting gauge** 15 stitches in width and 19 row in height with stocking stitch and 1 strand of each quality on needle size 5 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches within 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches within 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
